name: Worms?
description: Worms? is a computer game written by David Maynard and published by Electronic Arts in 1983 for the Atari 8-bit family and Commodore 64. It is one of the five initial titles from the company. More a software toy than a game, Worms? is an interactive version of Paterson's Worms. Maynard later worked on the 8-bit word processor from Electronic Arts, Cut & Paste.
